item.title: Tim Cook Says Apple is 'Making Good Progress' on Personalized Siri
item.description: In a recent interview, Apple CEO Tim Cook told Reuters that the company is “making good progress on a personalized Siri” that is powered by Apple Intelligence, although he did not provide an updated l
